title: thuli thuli mazhaiyai lyrics paiya  song lyrics
stanzas:
Thuli thuli mazhayaai ponaaley
suda suda maraidhey ponaaley
paarthal parka thondrum
perai ketka thondrum
popol sirikum podhu
kaatrai parandhida thondrum .

sel sel avaludan sel
endrey kalgal solludhada
sol sol avalidam sol
endrey nenjam kolludhada
azhagai manadhai parithuvitaaley ...

Thuli thuli mazhayaai ponaaley ..
suda suda maraidhey ponaaley

Devadhai aval oru devadhai
azhagiya poomugam kanavey
aayul thaan podhumo
katriley avaladhu vaasanai
avalidam yosannai ketuthan
pookalum pookumo

netri mela otraimudi aadum podhu
nenjukulle minnal pookum
parvai aalai thookum
kanam parthal muthangalal theenda thondrum
padham rendu parkum podhu
golusaai marathondrum

sel sel avaludan sel
endrey kalgal solludhada
sol sol avalidam sol
endrey nenjam kolludhada
salayil azhagiya mazhayil
avaludan pogave yenguven
thozgalil saayuven

boomiyil vizhugira velayil
nizhalayum odipoi yendhuven
nenjiley thanguven
kanum podhey kanaal ennai katti potal
kayamindri vetti potal
uyirai edho seidhal
mounamaga ullukuley pesum podhum
ange vandhu ottu ketal kanvile koochal potal

sel sel avaludan sel
endrey kalgal solludhada
sol sol avalidam sol
endrey nenjam kolludhada
